Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mera.Text: Singes a single enemy with a small fireball.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Merami.Text: Burns a single enemy with a large fireball.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Merazoma.Text: Incinerates a single enemy with an enormous fireball.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Gira.Text: Singes a group of enemies with a blazing fire.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Begirama.Text: Burns a group of enemies with a blazing wall of fire.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Begiragon.Text: Scorches a group of enemies with the blazing flames of the underworld.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Io.Text: Damages all enemies with a small explosion.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Iora.Text: Engulfs all enemies in a large explosion.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Ionazun.Text: Blasts all enemies with an incredibly violent explosion.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hyado.Text: Pierces a single enemy with razor-sharp icicles.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hyadaruko.Text: Rips into a group of enemies with sharp icicles.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hyadain.Text: Skewers all enemies with a hail of sharp icicles.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mahyado.Text: Slices all enemies with a stinging storm of icicles.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bagi.Text: Slices through a group of enemies with a small whirlwind.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bagima.Text: Slices through a group of enemies with a powerful whirlwind.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bagikurosu.Text: Slices through a group of enemies with a ferociously destructive whirlwind.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Zaki.Text: A cursed incantation that sends an enemy to the hereafter.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Zaraki.Text: A cursed incantation that sends a group of enemies to the hereafter.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Megante.Text: Sacrifices your own life to destroy all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Dein.Text: Calls down lightning on a single enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Raidein.Text: Calls down fearsome lightning on a single enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Gigadein.Text: Rains down powerful thunderbolts on all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Doragoramu.Text: Transform into a fire-breathing dragon that can drown all enemies in a sea of flames.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sukara.Text: Significantly raises the defence of a single party member.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sukuruto.Text: Slightly raises the defence of all party members.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Baikiruto.Text: Significantly increases the attack of a single party member.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Piorimu.Text: Slightly raises the agility of all party members.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Fubaha.Text: Forms a barrier that protects all party members from breath attacks.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Majikkubaria.Text: Builds a barrier around all party members that provides protection from enemy spells.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bomiosu.Text: Significantly reduces the agility of a group of enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Rukani.Text: Significantly reduces the defence of a single enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Rukanan.Text: Slightly reduces the defence of a group of enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Manusa.Text: Envelops a group of enemies in illusions.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mahoton.Text: Prevents a group of enemies from using magic.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Medapani.Text: Sends one enemy into a state of confusion.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Rariho.Text: Puts a group of enemies to sleep.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bashirura.Text: Sends a single enemy flying off into the distance.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Nihuramu.Text: Can make a group of enemies disappear.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mahotora.Text: Steals MP from a single enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mahokanta.Text: Forms a barrier around an ally that reflects the spells of friend and foe alike.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Asutoron.Text: Turns all party members to steel for several turns, rendering them invulnerable, but immobile.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Moshasu.Text: Take on the form of a fellow party member.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Parupunte.Text: Take a chance with Lady Luck! Only she knows what will happen.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hoimi.Text: Restores at least 30 HP to a single ally.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Behoimi.Text: Restores at least 75 HP to a single ally.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Behoimu.Text: Restores at least 164 HP to a single ally.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Behoma.Text: Restores all HP to a single ally.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Behomara.Text: Restores at least 75 HP to all party members.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Behomazun.Text: Restores all HP to all party members.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kiari.Text: Cures a single ally of the effects of poison.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kiariku.Text: Cures a single ally of the effects of paralysis.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Zameha.Text: Cures all party members of the effects of sleep.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mahori.Text: Cures a single ally of the effects of Fizzle, allowing them to use magic again.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Shanaku.Text: Lifts a curse from a single ally.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Zao.Text: Sometimes resurrects a fallen ally at 1 HP.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Rura.Text: Allows you to return instantly to certain places you have visited before.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Riremito.Text: Allows you to exit instantly from dungeons, caves and towers.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Toherosu.Text: Generates a holy aura that causes weaker monsters to avoid your party.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Toramana.Text: Allows the party to float unharmed over hazardous surfaces.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Inpasu.Text: Reveals the nature of a treasure chest's contents.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Remirama.Text: Lets you know if there's any treasure or other goodies nearby.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Ranaruta.Text: Turns night into day, and vice-versa when used on the world map.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Remuoru.Text: Makes you invisible for a short while.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kaengiri.Text: Slashes an enemy with a scorching sword.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mikawasikyaku.Text: Employs fancy footwork to increase the user's ability to evade attacks.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Inazumagiri.Text: Slashes an enemy with a crackling sword infused with lightning.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Daibougyo.Text: Significantly reduces the damage taken from all attacks.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sinkuugiri.Text: Slashes an enemy with a gale-force blade.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Meisou.Text: Centres the self in order to summon the strongest healing spirit within.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hayabusagiri.Text: A double-slicing attack faster than a falcon on the wing.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Gigasurassyu.Text: A secret sword technique that assails all enemies with bolts of blazing lightning.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Ukenagasi.Text: Deflects enemy attacks onto an enemy or an ally.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kabau.Text: Enables the user to absorb attacks in another's stead.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sippuuduki.Text: Strikes an enemy before anyone else can act.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Morobagiri.Text: Does plenty of damage to an enemy, but at the expense of the user's own HP.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kyuushoduki.Text: An attack on an enemy's weak point that can sometimes kill them instantly.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Nioudati.Text: Enables the user to stand between the enemy and their allies and soak up all incoming blows.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Turuginomai.Text: Randomly slices through all enemies with a series of controlled cuts.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Metarugiri.Text: An attack that's capable of damaging a single metal-bodied foe.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Samidareken.Text: Unleashes a flurry of slashes that cut through all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Konsingiri.Text: An overhead swing that can inflict a good deal of damage.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Asibarai.Text: An unbalancing blow that can send an enemy sprawling.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Tobihizageri.Text: A flying kick that's especially effective against airborne enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hittyuuken.Text: A strike that's nigh on undodgeable, unblockable and unstoppable, even when the user is bedazzled.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kamaitati.Text: Sends several sickles made of air flying towards an enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Seikenduki.Text: A powerfully focused and damaging bare-fisted strike.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sutemi.Text: Abandon defence in order to unleash an all-out attack on an enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mawasigeri.Text: A sweeping kick that smacks through a whole group of enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bakuretuken.Text: Unleashes a four-punch flurry of hits on all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Itetukuhamon.Text: Removes all beneficial effects from a single enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kaisinhittyuu.Text: A dream ability that can ensure a critical hit on an enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Isitubute.Text: Launches a barrage of small stones at all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Tikaratame.Text: Builds up energy to bolster the next attack.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Oogoe.Text: Summons a wandering merchant, innkeeper or priest to your side.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bunmawasi.Text: Swipes at a group of enemies with a great swing of your weapon.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Guntaiyobi.Text: Enlist an army of mercenaries for a fee of 50 gold coins multiplied by your current level.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Tukkomi.Text: A short, sharp shock that can snap a fellow party member out of sleep, confusion and paralysis.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kutibue.Text: Attracts the attention of nearby monsters.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Megazarudansu.Text: A self-sacrificing step that resurrects all allies and fully restores their HP.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bukiminahikari.Text: Weakens an enemy's resistance to all offensive spells.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Ouen.Text: Cheers on an ally, significantly increasing their attack for one turn.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Munsaruto.Text: A brutal backflipping kick that hits all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hassurudansu.Text: Restores at least 70 HP to all party members.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Maryokukakusei.Text: Greatly increases the damage done by any offensive spells the user casts.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sunakemuri.Text: Conjures a sandstorm which reduces an enemy group's accuracy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Nemuriatakku.Text: A drowsy attack that sends an enemy off to sleep.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Uinguburou.Text: A whirling, windy onslaught on a single enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sibireatakku.Text: An arresting assault that paralyses an enemy.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Touzokunohana.Text: Allows you to find out how much unclaimed treasure is in the area.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Asashinatakku.Text: An attack on an enemy's weak point that can sometimes kill them instantly.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Sinobiasi.Text: Allows the party to travel undetected by monsters for a short while.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Rasenuti.Text: A wallop with the whip on a group of enemies that can sometimes confuse them.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hyupunosuhanto.Text: A sly strike that can see a single sleeping or confused enemy taking six times the usual damage.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Oikaze.Text: Reflects breath attacks back at the source, but only for one turn.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Namemawasu.Text: Gives an enemy a little lick, sometimes leaving them too stunned to move.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Tooboe.Text: Summons a wolf warrior that unleashes four strikes on all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Yasuraginouta.Text: A nice, calm number that restores at least 20 HP to all party members.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Yaseinokan.Text: Searches for any friendly monsters lurking nearby.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Mamonoyobi.Text: Sics the monsters you've rescued on all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kedukuroi.Text: Makes an ally look a bit more presentable, restoring at least 50 HP.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Yaibakudaki.Text: A heavy hit that reduces an enemy's attack.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Ainomuti.Text: An attack on a group of enemies that can deal heavy damage to humanoid-family foes.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Otakebi.Text: A mighty bellow that gives all enemies a fright.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Hyakuretuname.Text: Gives an enemy a large lick, leaving them trembling with fear.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kaennoiki.Text: Unleashes a flaming breath attack on all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Bisutomodo.Text: Allows you to act twice per turn for a wee while.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Gansekiotosi.Text: Lobs a big boulder that hits the heads of all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Seisintouitu.Text: Restores the caster's MP after each turn for a while.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Yaketukuiki.Text: A sizzling breath attack that paralyses all enemies.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kuroikiri.Text: Neutralises all magical effects affecting allies and enemies alike, as well as preventing everyone from casting spells.

Txt_Magic_Flavor_Kagayakuiki.Text: A frightfully frigid breath attack that freezes all enemies caught in its path.

Txt_Magic_Inpasu_1.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
A bluish light shines from inside the chest. It should be safe to open.

Txt_Magic_Inpasu_2.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
A reddish light shines from inside the chest. Open it with caution.

Txt_Magic_Inpasu_3.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
A yellowish light shines from inside the chest. Probably best opened with caution...

Txt_Magic_Inpasu_5.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
But there aren't any chests nearby.

Txt_Magic_Anahori_1.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls out a spade and starts digging for treasure!<KEY_WAIT>
Bingo! <DefSgl_ACTOR> unearths <IndefSgl_I_NAME>!

Txt_Magic_Anahori_2.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls out a spade and starts digging for treasure!<KEY_WAIT>
Bingo! <IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> unearths a <IfSing_VALUE(shiny gold coin,hoard of {VALUE} shiny gold coins)>!

Txt_Magic_Anahori_3.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls out a spade and starts digging for treasure!<KEY_WAIT>
But there's nothing there.

Txt_Magic_Anahori_4.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls out a spade and starts digging for treasure!<KEY_WAIT>
But sadly, it's not possible to dig here.

Txt_Magic_Oogoe_1.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> calls loudly for service!<KEY_WAIT>
As if by magic, a travelling item shop appears over the horizon!

Txt_Magic_Oogoe_2.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> calls loudly for service!<KEY_WAIT>
As if by magic, a travelling inn appears over the horizon!

Txt_Magic_Oogoe_3.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> calls loudly for service!<KEY_WAIT>
As if by magic, a travelling priest appears over the horizon!

Txt_Magic_Oogoe_4.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> calls loudly for service!<KEY_WAIT>
But nothing happens.

Txt_Magic_Touzokunohana_1.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> has a nose around for treasure.<KEY_WAIT>
(sniff sniff) There<IfSing_VALUE('s just one more treasure left, are another {VALUE} treasures left)> nearby.

Txt_Magic_Touzokunohana_2.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> has a nose around for treasure.<KEY_WAIT>
(sniff sniff) No...there doesn't appear to be any more treasure around here.

Txt_Magic_Touzokunohana_3.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> has a nose around for treasure.<KEY_WAIT>
(sniff sniff) There<IfSing_VALUE('s just one more treasure left, are another {VALUE} treasures left)> on this level.

Txt_Magic_Touzokunohana_4.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> has a nose around for treasure.<KEY_WAIT>
(sniff sniff) No...there doesn't appear to be any more treasure on this level.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Effective_Sinobiasi.Text: <IfSolo({ACTOR} starts to sneak around as stealthily as a thief,The party start to sneak around as stealthily as thieves)>.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Effective_Yaseinokan.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> listens to <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,their)> animal instinct.<KEY_WAIT><IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> realises there's a monster ready to be wrangled nearby!
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> listens to <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> animal instinct.<KEY_WAIT><IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> realises there's a monster not too far away that's ready to be wrangled!

<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> listens to <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,their)> animal instinct.<KEY_WAIT><IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> realises there's a monster to be wrangled nearby, but it's not out and about at the moment.

<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> listens to <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,their)> animal instinct.<KEY_WAIT><IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> realises there's a monster to be wrangled not too far away, but it's not out and about at the moment.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Common_2.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> tries to cast {WORD}.<KEY_WAIT>
But <DefSgl_TARGET> has no use for it right now.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Common_3.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
But it doesn't seem to do anything particularly useful right now.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Common_4.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
But it doesn't seem to do anything particularly useful right now.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Common_5.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
But a mysterious power nullifies the spell!

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Common_6.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> tries to cast {WORD}.<KEY_WAIT>
But it seems that spell is of no use to the party right now.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Kutibue.Text:
{ACTOR} lets out an ear-piercing whistle!
<KEY_WAIT>
But nothing happens!

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Yaseinokan.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> listens to <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,their)> animal instinct.<KEY_WAIT>Sadly there don't seem to be any monsters nearby.

Txt_Magic_Field_Use_Invalid_Ranaruta.Text:
<DefSgl_ACTOR> casts {WORD}!<KEY_WAIT>
But it doesn't seem to do anything particularly useful here.

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Hayabusagiri.Text:
<Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> slices once,
then strikes again before the enemy can blink!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Ukenagasi.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> prepares to deflect any enemy attacks!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Sippuuduki.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> strikes in the blink of an eye!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Sippuuduki_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> strikes in the blink of an eye!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Morobagiri.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> strikes at the enemy's weak spot with no thought for <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> own safety!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Nioudati.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> prepares to intercept all incoming attacks!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Sutemi.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_ACTOR(<DefSgl_ACTOR> unleash,<IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR> unleashes,<DefSgl_ACTOR> unleashes)>)> an all-out assault!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Itetukuhamon.Text: A ripple of disruption emanates from <IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)>'s hands!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Tukkomi.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> snaps <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> out of it with a slap!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Maryokukakusei.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_ACTOR(<DefSgl_ACTOR> focus,<IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR> fouses,<DefSgl_ACTOR> fouses)>)> as hard as <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)> can!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Tooboe.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> takes a deep breath and unleashes an ear-splitting whistle!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Bisutomodo.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> takes a walk on the wild side!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Gansekiotosi.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> hurls a barrage of huge boulders!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Seisintouitu.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_ACTOR(<DefSgl_ACTOR> calm,<IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR> calms,<DefSgl_ACTOR> calms)>)> <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> mind and focuses...

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Kuroikiri.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> unleashes a thick fog that envelops everything!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Surudoikiba.Text:
<Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> tries to take a bite out of <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>
with <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> enormous fangs!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Dragon_Attack_Par.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> spits out a fiery torrent of flame!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_1_Itetukuhamon_2.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> emits a ripple of disruptive energy!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_2_Ouen.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Nicely done! Keep up the good work!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_2_Munsaruto.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> goes into a spin and kicks the enemy!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_2_Mamonoyobi.Text: The monsters assemble to aid their dearest friend!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Zaraki.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> killed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Megante.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> explodes,The party explode)> into a thousand pieces!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Megante_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> explode,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> explodes,<DefSgl_TARGET> explodes)>,The enemy explode)>)> into a thousand pieces!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Fubaha.Text: A mantle of soft, protective light settles around <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Fubaha_Enemy.Text: A mantle of soft, protective light settles around <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Bashirura_2.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_TARGET> is sent flying off into the distance!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Bashirura.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> goes flying off into the distance!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Nihuramu_Enem.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> vanish,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> vanishes,<DefSgl_TARGET> vanishes)>,The enemy vanish)>)> in a flash of light!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Mahoton.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> prevented from casting spells!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Mahokanta.Text: A shining wall of light appears before <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Asutoron.Text: <IfSing_VALUE3(<Cap><DefSgl_TARGET>'s body hardens into a lump of steel!,The party's bodies harden into lumps of steel!)>

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Moshasu.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> transforms into the spitting image of <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Moshasu_2.Text: And ends up looking exactly the same!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_7.Text: The entire area is engulfed in darkness!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_8.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)> totally taken aback!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_10.Text: All of <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>'s MP are drained!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_12.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> runs,<DefSgl_TARGET> runs)>,The enemy run)> away screaming!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_13.Text: <IfSolo(<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>'s place in the,The)> party line-up is suddenly swapped around!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_14.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Hocus Pocus, Hocus Pocus...
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>'s words are lost upon the breeze...

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_15.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_ACTOR> is,The party are)> endowed with incredible attack!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Parupunte_16.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> disappear,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> disappears,<DefSgl_TARGET> disappears)>,The enemy disappear)>)> off over the horizon.

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Kyuushoduki.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> take,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> takes,<DefSgl_TARGET> takes)>,The enemy take)>)> a critical hit! <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>)> defeated!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Itetukuhamon.Text: All beneficial effects affecting <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)> are neutralised!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Itetukuhamon_.Text: All beneficial effects affecting <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)> are neutralised!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Ouen.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> feels like <IfGender_TARGET(he,she,it)> could take on anyone!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Sunakemuri.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> blinded by sand!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Sunakemuri_En.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,Multiple enemies are)>)> blinded by sand!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Otakebi.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> frozen with fear!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Otakebi_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> frozen with fear!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Bisutomodo.Text:
<Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s agility goes through the roof and
<IfGender_TARGET(he,she,it)> can now take two turns for the price of one!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Effective_Kuroikiri.Text: Everyone is prevented from casting spells!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Passive_Mahokanta.Text: <IfSing_VALUE3(The wall of light in front of <DefSgl_TARGET> deflects the spell,The spell is deflected by the wall of light)>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Passive_Mahokanta_2.Text: The spell is deflected by the wall of light!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Passive_Asutoron.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>'s steely body is,the party's steely bodies are)> unaffected!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Passive_Ukenagasi_2.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> fails to palm off the attack!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Passive_Kabau.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> bravely shields <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,multiple members of the party)>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Invalid_Common.Text: But a mysterious power nullifies the spell!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Invalid_Otakebi_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> completely unsurprised.

Txt_Magic_Battle_Invalid_Yaketukuiki.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> dodges,The party dodge)> the cloud of breath!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Invalid_Yaketukuiki_Ene.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> dodge,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> dodges,<DefSgl_TARGET> dodges)>,The enemy dodge)>)> the cloud of breath!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Invalid_Kabau.Text: But one of your allies is already shielding <DefSgl_TARGET>!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Baikiruto.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s attack is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Baikiruto_E.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>'s attack is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Piorimu.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s agility is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Piorimu_Ene.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>'s agility is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Fubaha.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s breath resistance is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Majikkubari.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s magical resistance is renewed!
The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>'s magical resistance is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Bomiosu.Text: The effect decreasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s agility is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Bomiosu_Ene.Text: The effect decreasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,the enemy)>'s agility is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Parupunte_1.Text: The effect increasing <IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s critical hit chance is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Mikawasikya.Text: The effect increasing <IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)>'s evasion is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Bukiminahik.Text: The effect decreasing <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s magical resistance is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Maryokukaku.Text: The effect increasing <IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)>'s magical might is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Seisintouit.Text: The effect restoring <IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)>'s MP is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_duplication_Kuroikiri.Text: The effect sealing away everyone's spells is renewed!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Doragoramu.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> has already transformed <IfGender_TARGET(himself,herself,itself)> into a giant dragon!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Sukara_Suku.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s defence can't increase any more!
<Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,The enemy)>'s defence can't increase any more!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Rukani_Ruka.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,the party)>'s defence can't decrease any more!
<Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,The enemy)>'s defence can't decrease any more!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Manusa.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> already hallucinating!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Manusa_Enem.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> already hallucinating!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Mahoton.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> already prevented from casting spells!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Mahoton_Ene.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> already prevented from casting spells!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Parupunte_9.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)> already surprised!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Ouen.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> already feels like <IfGender_TARGET(he,she,it)> could take on anyone!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Sunakemuri.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> already blinded by sand!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Sunakemuri_.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> already blinded by sand!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Bisutomodo.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> is already taking a walk on the wild side!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Yaketukuiki.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,The party are)> already paralysed, and powerless to act!
<Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> is,Multiple enemies are)>)> already paralysed, and powerless to act!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Upper_Limit_Dokunoiki.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,Multiple members of the party are)> already poisoned!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Resistance_Common_Enemy.Text: But <IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,the enemy are)>)> immune!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Otakebi.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> is,The party are)> frozen with fear.

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Otakebi_E.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> frozen with fear.

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Fanny.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> is rolling on the floor with laughter!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Shy.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> looks at the ground in embarrassment!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Liquor2.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> is busy trying to fend off a slurring <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>.

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Surprised.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> jump,<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> jumps,<DefSgl_TARGET> jumps)>)> out of <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,its)> skin with surprise!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Incapacitated_Tremble.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>)> shivering with fright!

Txt_Magic_Battle_Use_Dead_Megante.Text: Exhausted, <IfPlrNoun_ACTOR(<DefSgl_ACTOR> finally give,<IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR> finally gives,<DefSgl_ACTOR> finally gives)>)> up the ghost.

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Fubaha.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,The party)>'s breath resistance returns to normal.

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Fubaha_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,The enemy)>'s breath resistance returns to normal.

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Majikkubaria.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET>,The party)>'s magical resistance returns to normal.

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Majikkubaria_Ene.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>,The enemy)>'s magical resistance returns to normal.

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Mahokanta.Text: The effect of {S_NAME} on <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> wears off.

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Sunakemuri.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> gets the sand out of <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,its)>,Multiple members of the party get the sand out of their)> eyes!

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Sunakemuri_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> get the sand out of their,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> gets the sand out of <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,its)>,<DefSgl_TARGET> gets the sand out of <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,its)>)>,The enemy get the sand out of their)>)> eyes!

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Bisutomodo.Text: The effect of {S_NAME} on <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> wears off!

Txt_Magic_Out_of_effect_Kuroikiri.Text: The fog clears<--->now everyone can cast spells again!

Txt_Magic_Counter_Breath_Oikaze.Text: The backdraft surrounding <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> reflects the breath attack!

Txt_Magic_Play_01_Success.Text: <IfGender_ACTOR(His,Her,Its)> weapon catches <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> on the way down!

Txt_Magic_Play_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> suddenly makes a run for it! But <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> way is blocked!

Txt_Magic_Play_03.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> shuts out everything around <IfGender_ACTOR(him,her,it)>, and hunkers down to defend <IfGender_ACTOR(himself,herself,itself)>!

Txt_Magic_Play_04.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> holds off on doing anything for now, and stands back to assess the situation.

Txt_Magic_Play_05.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> calls for backup!
But <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> faithful playmates are nowhere to be seen!

Txt_Magic_Play_07_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Zzz...
Would you believe it!?
<IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)>'s fast asleep!

Txt_Magic_Play_08_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> picks up some stones and starts juggling with them!

Txt_Magic_Play_08_Success.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Whoopsy-daisy!
One of the stones lands on <DefSgl_TARGET>'s head!

Txt_Magic_Play_08_Failure.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Whoopsy-daisy!
One of the stones lands on <DefSgl_ACTOR>'s big toe!

Txt_Magic_Play_09.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> starts to sing and dance about like an absolute joker!

Txt_Magic_Play_10_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> blasts the enemy with a stinging verbal tirade!

Txt_Magic_Play_10_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Ner-ner-na-ner-nerrr!
You smell! A-And you're rubbish!
...So THERE!

Txt_Magic_Play_10_03.Text: But <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> words fail to ruffle any feathers...

Txt_Magic_Play_12_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> taps <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> feet to the rhythm of the battle!

Txt_Magic_Play_12_02.Text: Suddenly, ducking and swaying out of danger's way doesn't seem so hard!

Txt_Magic_Play_13.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> twirls <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> fingers in front of <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s face!

Txt_Magic_Play_13_Success.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s eyes start to spin round and round!

Txt_Magic_Play_13_Failure_A.Text: But <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> isn't fazed in the slightest...

Txt_Magic_Play_13_Failure_B.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>'s eyes start to spin round and round!

Txt_Magic_Play_15.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls out a mirror and starts touching up <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> make-up.

Txt_Magic_Play_16_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> starts writhing around but just can't move.

Txt_Magic_Play_17_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> tries making up an amazing new spell.

Txt_Magic_Play_18_01.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> prays fervently to the heavens...
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: O merciful Goddess, I beg of you<--->bring peace to our world!

Txt_Magic_Play_18_02.Text: ...But this is neither the time nor the place...

Txt_Magic_Play_19_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Maybe it's time to stop messing around and take life seriously.

Txt_Magic_Play_19_03.Text: <IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> gets the distinct feeling there was something very important <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)> was supposed to be doing...

Txt_Magic_Play_19_04.Text: And starts muttering away feverishly to <IfGender_ACTOR(himself,herself,itself)>...

Txt_Magic_Play_20_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> comes up with a hilarious joke!

Txt_Magic_Play_20_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: ...BECAUSE THE SEA WEED!!!
Wacka wacka! Hooonk!

Txt_Magic_Play_20_03.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: ...WHY THE LONG FACE!!!
Geddit? Hyuk hyuk hyuk!

Txt_Magic_Play_20_04.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: ...NOTHING, IT JUST LET OUT A LITTLE WINE!!!
You know... Grapes...wine...? Yeah!
Hur de hur de hur hur!

Txt_Magic_Play_20_06.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: ...BECAUSE HE WAS A LITTLE HORSE!!!
You know<--->horse, hoarse... No?

Txt_Magic_Play_20_07.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: ...HE KNEADED A POO!!!
Yuk yuk yuk! Classic, eh?

Txt_Magic_Play_20_09.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: ...NO, I'M A FRAYED KNOT!!!
Woohoohoooo! Boom boom!

Txt_Magic_Play_20_Success.Text: Direct hit! <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> collapse,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> collapses,<DefSgl_TARGET> collapses)>,The enemy collapse)>)> on the floor in fits of laughter!

Txt_Magic_Play_20_Failure.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> distinctly unamused.

Txt_Magic_Play_21_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> slowly and deliberately rolls a large dice.

Txt_Magic_Play_21_02.Text:
It lands on a {VALUE}...
And nothing happens.

Txt_Magic_Play_22_Success_A.Text: It sounds like cats screeching in an alleyway! <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> run,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> runs,<DefSgl_TARGET> runs)>,The enemy run)>)> off as fast as <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,their)> legs will carry <IfGender_TARGET(him,her,them)>!

Txt_Magic_Play_22_Success_B.Text:
The haunting melody drifts across the battlefield...
<Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> are,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> is,<DefSgl_TARGET> is)>,The enemy are)>)> completely captivated!

Txt_Magic_Play_22_Failure.Text: But <IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> aren't,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> isn't,<DefSgl_TARGET> isn't)>,the enemy aren't)>)> really listening.

Txt_Magic_Play_23_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> is suddenly distracted by a smutty thought.

Txt_Magic_Play_24_04.Text: <Cap><IfSing_VALUE3(<DefSgl_TARGET> jumps out of <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,their)>,The party jump out of their)> skin with surprise!

Txt_Magic_Play_24_04_Enemy.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> jump,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> jumps,<DefSgl_TARGET> jumps)>,The enemy jump)>)> out of their skin with surprise!

Txt_Magic_Play_25_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> starts an impromptu game of <6>I Spy<9>.

Txt_Magic_Play_25_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: I spy with my little eye, something beginning wiiith...{WORD}! No, wait! I-I meant to say<---> Ach!

Txt_Magic_Play_25_03.Text: <IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> makes a complete mess of it!

Txt_Magic_Play_26_Success.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> gets all flustered and looks away!

Txt_Magic_Play_27_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: It was a dark and stormy night...

Txt_Magic_Play_27_03.Text: That was enough to give anyone the creeps!

Txt_Magic_Play_28_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls a crown from somewhere and puts it on!

Txt_Magic_Play_28_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Verily, I am the king of thee!
HA HA HA! Kneel before me!

Txt_Magic_Play_28_Success_01.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> shuffles nervously up to <IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> and bows low!

Txt_Magic_Play_28_Success_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> spots <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> chance, and biffs <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> on the back of the head!

Txt_Magic_Play_28_Failure_Enemy.Text: But <IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> clearly aren't,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> clearly isn't,<DefSgl_TARGET> clearly isn't)>,the enemy clearly aren't)>)> impressed!

Txt_Magic_Play_29_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> puts on a crown, whips out a sceptre and adopts a thoroughly queenly air!

Txt_Magic_Play_29_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Yea, I am thy queen!
HA HA HA! Kneel before me!

Txt_Magic_Play_29_Success_01.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> shuffles nervously up to <IfSuffix_ACTOR(<Sgl_ACTOR>,<DefSgl_ACTOR>)> and bows low!

Txt_Magic_Play_29_Success_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> spots <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> chance, and stamps on <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s big toe!

Txt_Magic_Play_30_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> sneaks up behind <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> and puts <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> hands over <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,its)> eyes!

Txt_Magic_Play_30_04.Text: Oh no! <IfGender_TARGET(He,She,It)> got it in one!

Txt_Magic_Play_31_03.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> get weirded out and run away,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> gets weirded out and runs away,<DefSgl_TARGET> gets weirded out and runs away)>,The enemy get weirded out and run away)>)>!

Txt_Magic_Play_32_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> gives the party some stirring words of encouragement!

Txt_Magic_Play_32_02.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Come on, you lot! We can do this!

Txt_Magic_Play_32_Success.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>'s words get the party totally pumped!

Txt_Magic_Play_33_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls out a drink <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)> has stashed up <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> sleeve, and downs it in one!

Txt_Magic_Play_33_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: (glug glug glug) Ahhh!!!
That hit the spot! Hic!

Txt_Magic_Play_33_03.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: What'sh your<--->Hic!<--->problem, eh?
Reckon you're shpecial, do you? (burp)
Think you're<--->Hic!<--->better than me?

Txt_Magic_Play_33_Failure.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Hic! Bleeeurgh!
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> is feeling a little...poorly...

Txt_Magic_Play_34_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> points at <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> and starts bad-mouthing <IfGender_TARGET(him,her,it)> loudly!

Txt_Magic_Play_34_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: Yeah, yeah... That one...
Looks like a right wimp, eh?
Heh! Pathetic!

Txt_Magic_Play_34_Failure.Text: <Cap><IfPlrNoun_TARGET(<DefSgl_TARGET> weren't,<IfSing_VALUE3(<IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET> wasn't,<DefSgl_TARGET> wasn't)>,The enemy weren't)>)> taking any notice.

Txt_Magic_Play_35.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> summons up all <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> strength, and hurls a huge boulder straight up in the air!

Txt_Magic_Play_35_Success.Text: The boulder lands squarely on <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s head!

Txt_Magic_Play_35_Failure.Text: The boulder lands harmlessly on the ground.

Txt_Magic_Play_36_Success_F.Text: <Cap><IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)> has a huge grin on <IfGender_TARGET(his,her,its)> face!

Txt_Magic_Play_37_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> tries out a special move <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)>'s just thought up on <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>!

Txt_Magic_Play_37_02.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR>: You shall be the first to feel my...
{WORD}!!!

Txt_Magic_Play_37_03.Text: ...But it looks suspiciously like a normal attack.

Txt_Magic_Play_39_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> pulls a scrap of paper out of <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> pocket and sets fire to it for fun!

Txt_Magic_Play_39_03.Text: <IfGender_ACTOR(He,She,It)> throws the burning piece of paper in <IfSuffix_TARGET(<Sgl_TARGET>,<DefSgl_TARGET>)>'s direction!

Txt_Magic_Play_40_01.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> starts trying to think of fun games to play with <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> friends.

Txt_Magic_Play_40_02.Text: But <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)> soon remembers that the battlefield is no playground.

Txt_Magic_Play_40_03.Text: The sight of <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,its)> friends fighting alongside <IfGender_ACTOR(him,her,it)> warms <DefSgl_ACTOR>'s heart!

Txt_Magic_Play_40_04.Text: The warmth spreads throughout the party!

Txt_Magic_Play_40_05.Text: And everyone starts to feel the love!
